channel.title: Matrix, ... Cannot make client?
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I got a Matrix source, but how can i make an webclient or .jar client? It don't work...
- Wout

item.title: Matrix, ... Cannot make client?
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:9, topic:450281”][quote author=methodd link=topic=553176.msg4054981#msg4054981 date=1342847400]

You can’t “make” a compiler, you wrote a batch script that calls the compiler to compile the files listed.
As for rep, you can’t ask for rep, and neither of these guys can rep you anyways.
Just had to clear those things up.
[/quote] im dumb founded by what u just said… how did i make a compiler then…? DUMBASS.

I’ve said it once and I’ll say it again, you can’t “make” a compiler.
Did you write “javac.exe”? If you did, then you did make a compiler.
[font=arial black]You’re[/font] far too ignorant to work for Oracle, so I highly doubt that.[/quote]
he doesn’t understand what you mean.

Also it’s ‘You’re*’

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix, ... Cannot make client?

@tyb97 wrote:

You can’t “make” a compiler, you wrote a batch script that calls the compiler to compile the files listed.
As for rep, you can’t ask for rep, and neither of these guys can rep you anyways.
Just had to clear those things up.
[/quote] im dumb founded by what u just said… how did i make a compiler then…? DUMBASS.[/quote]
I’ve said it once and I’ll say it again, you can’t “make” a compiler.
Did you write “javac.exe”? If you did, then you did make a compiler.
Your far too ignorant to work for Oracle, so I highly doubt that.

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix, ... Cannot make client?
item.dc:creator: @methodd methodd
item.description:
@methodd wrote:

the matrix source, u have to make a compiler urself: make a .txt file and rename it Compiler.bat
after u rename it right-click and go to edit and post this:

@echo off title Compiler echo starting... "C:/Program Files/Java/Jdk1.7.0_05/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/cache/loaders/*.java src/com/rs/cores/*.java src/com/rs/game/*.java src/com/rs/game/item/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/impl/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/corp/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dragons/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dungeonnering/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/bandos/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/barrows/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/saradomin/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zammorak/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zaros/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/kalph/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/others/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/slayer/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/rooms/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java src/com/rs/game/tasks/*.java src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/io/*.java src/com/rs/net/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java src/com/rs/net/encoders/*.java src/com/rs/tools/*.java src/com/rs/utils/*.java src/com/rs/utils/huffman/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/armadyl/*.java pause
then save and compiler should work - REP++

As for the JARing part you can ask me to do it for you, very simple. Skype me: xDetrick
REP++

Read full topic
